category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 14 (Life Sports Committee)
contents: Article 14 (Life Sports Committee) The Life Sports Committee shall respond to the chairman's advice on the following matters. Revised 2018. 7. 9., 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5. 1. Deleted 2019. 1. 31. 2. Matters pertaining to the promotion of daily sports 3. Matters pertaining to the revitalization of workplace sports 4. Matters related to the facilities and operation of stadiums and gymnasiums (including private gyms) targeting the general public 5. Matters related to the operation of city/provincial sports committees 6. Other matters deemed to be in accordance with the functions of the sports committee and decided by the chairman What to do
